<<<<<<< HEAD
The miserie of Flaunders, calamitie of Fraunce, misfortune of Portugall, vnquietnes of Irelande, troubles of Scotlande: and the blessed state of Englande. VVritten by Tho. Churchyarde Gent. 1579 Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.
[42] p.
[By Felix Kingston] for Andrewe Maunsell, dwellyng in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Parret, Imprinted at London : [1579]
In verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: pi² A-E⁴ (-C4). The first leaf is blank. C4 is cancelled without a gap in the text. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

[42] p.
[By Felix Kingston] for Andrewe Maunsell, dwellyng in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Parret, Imprinted at London : [1579]
In verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: pi² A-E⁴ (-C4). The first leaf is blank. C4 is cancelled without a gap in the text. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
